text: Herot kamaghɨn amigha a fo, a fomɨra uan dozim Filip da an amuim Herodias a ini. Ezɨ Jon zurara kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Herot, na arazir kuram gamuava uan dozim da an amuim ini.” Jon kamagh mɨgeima, Herodias a bagha guizbangɨra navim isia, egha a Jon mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghasa a bagha puvɨra Herotɨn mɨgei. Ezɨ Herot Herodias ifongezir moghɨn damuan aghuaghava, a uan gumazir mabav kemezɨma me Jonɨn suiragha a inigha kalabus gatɨ. Herot fo, Jon Godɨn damazimɨn zuegha derazir gumazimra. Kamaghɨn amizɨma Herot an atiatiava, a inigha deragha an gari. Herot uaghan Jon mɨgeir akaba baragha nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh amuava, ana akaba baraghasa ifonge.
